altername_name: Woody Woodpecker: Escape from Buzz Buzzard Park
name: Woody Woodpecker
overview: Woody Woodpecker is a 2D platform game, based on the Woody Woodpecker cartoon series. Old Buzz Buzzard has kidnapped Woody's niece and nephew, and... his remote controller. Now Woody must rescue them. The player controls Woody Woodpecker. This is a typical platformer game with lots of jumping, collecting items and killing enemies. Woody uses beak, kicks or sometimes hilarious weaponry.
